patreon.com/universalgamestudio About Villa Party I

Richie, the wealthy special man from Florida has announced a special Party event on one of the social networks. This event is an extremely unique adult party with full of surprise and magic. Richie has drawn nine people - five women and four men - for this event. Among the nine people you are one of the lucky ones who can go to the Party. The choice is in your hands! You can go to the Party or stay at home to sleep.
Villa Party I. is a 3D interactive party simulation game for adults where your choices will shape the events and outcome to a multitude of possible endings. It means more humour, looseness, magic, adult and erotic things, surprises. Villa Party project has a main story line, but every choice you make can lead to a different outcome. Are you ready to play with Villa Party I.? Richie, the host drawn 4 men and 5 women. You are the 4th male, who is invited to his party. The party is underway, and the guests are drinking and having fun. Don't stay out of it! As you walk in it, new experiences await.

VILLA PARTY IS VERY FUN! After all, complete with all the debauchery you’d expect. Be warned, there is little foul language, tons of nudity, sexual contents, party games and sex. It doesn’t pull any punches! You decide who to befriend, and who to betray as you unravel each guest’s unique storyline, guaranteed to be packed with fun quests and challenges. Every character in the game is sexy and hot, and they are waiting for you to experience a wild adventure!

Villa Party is an amazing and breathtaking 3D party simulation game with sexy realistic characters, magic, challenges and sarcastic humor. Be part of this amazing story, you can't imagine what party awaits you. Now is the time to go to the Richie's house and get to know him and his guests!
